text: "The Man with the Child in His Eyes" is a 1978 song by English singer- songwriter Kate Bush and is the second single from her debut studio album The Kick Inside. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 3 in Ireland, number 85 in the United States, number 23 in New Zealand and the Netherlands and number 22 in Australia. ==Track listing== 7" single (EMI 2806) (UK) # "The Man with the Child in His Eyes" – 2:42 # "Moving" – 3:06 ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Kate Bush songs Category:Progressive pop songs
title: The Man with the Child in His Eyes
